plot: A thief breaks into a house, but bumps into the owner - a lonely, old man, who starts a conversation. They realize they know one another, while the cops are coming, responding to a silent alarm.
title: Silent Night
plot_es: A thief breaks into a house, but bumps into the owner - a lonely, old man, who starts a conversation. They realize they know one another, while the cops are coming, responding to a silent alarm.
plot_en: A thief breaks into a house, but bumps into the owner - a lonely, old man, who starts a conversation. They realize they know one another, while the cops are coming, responding to a silent alarm.
